title: The Millennials are coming (to Washington)
description: The most educated generation in history is without a political home. These young adults have come of age through war, recessions and shootings, all during their most productive years. Will they coalesce behind a party or rip the institutions completely apart?
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: The most educated generation in history is without a political home. These young adults have come of age through war, recessions and shootings, all during their most productive years. Will they coalesce behind a party or rip the institutions completely apart?
itunes:title: The Millennials are coming (to Washington)
itunes:author: NBC News
itunes:summary: The most educated generation in history is without a political home. As millennials become middle-aged, their rising political power could signal a shift in the American political landscape.
itunes:subtitle: The most educated generation in history is without a political home. As millennials become middle-aged, their rising political power could signal a shift in the American political landscape.
